channel.title: Compiling error need help asap!
channel.description: somone please help me i have jdk ad everything i just cant compile tho i hav it saved in c program files under java but am i supposed to change both path and class path? or just oen of those somone please helpe m caus i need to compile[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2008, 08:41:08 pm[/size][hr]You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download the newest JDK Update. Press any key to continue . . . dats the error i get but i hva java jdk 5.11

item.title: Compiling error need help asap!
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Variables[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2008, 08:47:01 pm[/size][hr]so pretty much make your
CLASSPATH value this…

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin

PATH value to this…

C:\PROGRAM FILES\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN;

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error need help asap!
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

change the end of your values to match that of the jdk you just downloaded

so im assuming you downloaded jdk update 11
your values would look like…

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin

if you have done that and it still doesn’t work change the compiler to

@echo off
title  Compiler
javac *.java
pause

Read full topic
